chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: state
p: proc A
sc: schedule
scs: seq schedule
P: state -> proc A -> Prop

Goal:
always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s

Premises:
always_sc : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
Notation seq := list
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
all_iffLR : all_iff ?P0 ?Ps -> forall m n : nat, nth ?P0 (?P0 :: ?Ps) m -> nth ?P0 (?P0 :: ?Ps) n where ?P0 : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc A sc : schedule scs : seq schedule P : state -> proc A -> Prop |- Prop] ?Ps : [this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc A sc : schedule scs : seq schedule P : state -> proc A -> Prop |- seq Prop]
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
pstep_safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A ->...-> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
schedule_sind : forall P : schedule -> SProp, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
schedule_rect : forall P : schedule -> Type, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
schedule_ind : forall P : schedule -> Prop, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
schedule_rec : forall P : schedule -> Set, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : seq A), P [::] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : seq A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : seq A), Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : seq A, Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A
List.Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : seq A -> seq A -> SProp), (forall l : seq A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : seq A), List.Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : seq A, List.Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Actions.can_send = fun (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s : state) => (l \in dom s) && (this \in nodes p (getStatelet s l)) : protocol -> nid -> Label -> state -> bool
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
Actions.skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
List.Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq B -> SProp), P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : seq A) (l' : seq B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : seq A) (l0 : seq B), List.Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
list_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
